Write-Up Text: The people of Australia have been discussing the federal budget on social media with mixed reactions. While some Queensland households have been left elated with the news of a 10% drop in power prices local veterans have reportedly been left empty-handed in the funding allocation. Peter Dutton has been called out for adding over $10B to the budget deficit against his beliefs of tax reduction and balanced spending. Along with this many families continue to struggle with the cost of living turning to Foodbank just to get the necessities despite some alleviation provided in both state and federal budgets.
